1151332.content:
Momo was the first to wake up feeling dizzy and lightheaded, she tried to get a hold of her soundings but she soon realized she can't use her quirk and noticed the other girls where they with her.
Waking the others up they all connected the dots and figured that someone attacked them when they where sleeping and drugged them so they can't use there quirks.
"So what do we do now? We have no clue where we are and no way of contacting anyone." Mina said
"Yea first thing first we gotta figure out where we are and how to escape." Mina said
"She's right but first thing, I really ummmm need to use the the restroom..." Ochaco said blushing
"Ochaco can't you hold it? It's not like we'll be here a while." Momo said
"I normally would but it feels like I'm about to burst and I don't want to rune the only clothes I have." Ochaco said
"(Sigh) alright Mina and Tsuyu you two go with Ochaco and help her find a restroom, if you three get in trouble shoot as loud as you can. Kyoka, Toru and myself well look around this floor to see what we can found." Momo said
"Alright" both Tsuyu and Mina nodded
The group split up and Ochaco had to bend over while holding her hands over her pants to help hold it the other girls looked at each other but keeped quite. As the three turned the corner they saw a out of order sign on the bathrooms,
"That it at this point I don't care I'm going." Ochaco said running into the bathroom the door slamming behind her leaving both Tyusu and Mina alone as this was happening Ochaco was grabbed from behind and knocked out again. Ochaco's attacker made preparations for what they had planned next, as the door was busted open by Mina and Tyusu the girls spotted Ochaco and her attacker was a grown woman before she vanished before there eyes.
"Mina? You saw that right?" Tyusu asked
"Yes but who she is doesn't matter right now we gotta ger Ochaco back." Mina asked
"Oh children, who I am well matter to you all very soon but I must ack on the ones who decided to break the rules." A voice said
"Who are you and where did you take our friend?" Mina said
"You'll see her soon enough but for now you got something else to worry about." The voice said before two robots appeared from no where and started to attack the two. The girls did there best to defend themselves from the robots but without there quirks it was hard to do any damage to the robots and they where quickly pinned down and tied upped.
"Now quickly bring those two to the punishment room." The voice said the robots grabbing the girls
At this point we switch over to the other group.
"Girls I can't seem to find a way out and the others haven't returned yet I'm starting to think something might have happened to them." Turo said
"Yeah it's been some time since they left for ochaco's "emergency" plus we've been looking for a way out for what seems like hours." Kyoka said
"Your friends all are safe with me but however they did break the rules and now are being punishment." A voice said
"Where are you! What did you do to our friends." Momo said the three backing up into a triangle formation
"Oh what lovely fighting spirits you UA students have but I bet it's hard to fight without your quirks, so you can either go see them nice and easily or I might have a few more for the punishment room." The voice said
"Punishment room? Wait I minute! Girls didn't you also noticed where we are?" Momo said
"Yeah same rooms had changing tables, cribs, and some doors where just simply locked and had one small window on the door." Turo said
"We're trapped in the old nursery for ADBLs" Momo said
"What's an ABDL?" Kyoka asked
"It stands for adult baby and diaper lover some people who lived in the area desided to open it up to help people like them come out to the open, but the place was quickly shut down do to people never leaving and being completely abused mentally and physically by a new owner." Momo said
"Well child you seem to know a lot about this place." The voice said as the girls saw the figure appear infront of them.
"And for that reason alone I'm afraid I can't let you three escape." The voice said the woman was fast to knock away Momo from the rest and grab her before she even could do anything Momo was knocked out cold. Kyoka and Turo stood tall only to hear a small hissing noise coming from Momo the woman quickly rose up Momo's skirt to found a now wet diaper around her waist.
"Well that explains why this one knowing so much." The attacker said
"What did you do to Momo!" Turo said
"Momo? Oh I remember her now, she the one that got away and told everyone about my nursery." The woman said "but soon enough all of you well be nothing but mommy's princesses who does nothing but obey her." The attacker said
"Woman your crazy if you think we'll allow you to do that." Kyoka said once again the woman vanshed and the girls were all quickly defeated.
"Well it looks like I have 6 new babies to raise." The woman said throwing Momo into a punishment room and Kyoka and Turo into another with Mina and Tsuyu.
The girls where still knocked out but there clothes was changed into diapers and dresses kyoka and Turo having placed pacifier gags and mittens on them.
"Well seems like these four are and ready but what should I do about the others.

1253222112312211111121112121.content:
(Hey, everyone! Thought I might give this series a try. Wish me luck!)

Baffling...was the understatement of the year.

...Or at least, it was to the daughter of the Fairy Godmother.

Jane was still initially confused as to why Evie was currently wearing a noticeably somewhat thick diaper underneath her outfit, let alone the same style and outfit Evie wore when she, Mal, Jay, and Carlos first came to Auradon Prep.
https://www.pinterest.com/pin/3362219284...

And yet, the most surprising still...was how so nonchalant Evie seemed to be, as if she was in diapers for some time now.

"...Helloooo? Fairy Goddaughter Jane~? You in there?" Evie quipped, snapping her fingers several times in front of Jane, as if to snap her out of a trance. Of course, it seemed to be rather effective, as Jane instinctively flinched at the fifth finger snap from the daughter of the Evil Queen, where Jane quickly retorted, "Huh, what? ...Sorry, Evie. Must be a little sleepy today."

Obviously and fortunately, 'Evie' bought the fabricated fib from Jane, as the blue-haired beauty gave the Fairy Goddaughter a warm friendly smile and replied, "*giggle* That's okay. Well...I suppose you put a fair point. After all, you're always a heavy sleeper, if you catch my drift."

"*chuckle* Yeah, I guess so." Jane answered, as Evie soon went into their wardrobe closet, seemingly disappeared for a brief moment, except for the audible crinkles of a padded diaper. Of course, Jane's thoughts wondered, "...Okay. This...This is getting weird, like REALLY weird. Why is Evie wearing diapers anyway?"

However, due to her own naivete, Jane soon spoke up toward Evie and asked, "...Hey, Evie? Can I...ask you something?" "Shoot, Eff-Gee." Evie promptly quipped, with the rustling sounds of clothes being shuffled about, where Jane swallowed a good gulp in hesitation and then asked, "Not to sound offensive, but...Why are you wearing a diaper?"

As if like a record being forcibly stopped on the turnstile, Evie poked her head out from the wardrobe closet doorway, cocking a rather confused eyebrow at the Fairy Goddaughter in response, where Evie then promptly replied, "...What are you going on about, Jane? You of all people should know why we and other girls are wearing diapers."

As if like a thunderbolt out of the blue, Jane soon immediately looked down over her lower half, only to feel...
1253222112312211111121112121.title: The Mirror World

12532221123122111111211121212.content: Does Evie explain that the teenage girls of this world are treated like babies?
12532221123122111111211121212.title: A much bulkier diaper. What's going on?

It was a way for the female students to behave like ladies.
Actually, it was for an entirely different reason...
125322211231221111112111212121.content:
From there, upon quickly peering under her covers to check if anything was amiss, Jane soon felt a rather...bulky experience around her privates, hips, and butt. Quickly, she put her hand underneath the bedsheets, placing it over where the padded sensation originated, only to hear several loud crinkles in retort.

In turn, this made Jane blush profusely, causing her eyes to widen and her cheeks to turn a beet red. In response, Jane quickly unfurled the covers of her bed from her lower half, only to bear witness to seeing a ludicrously bulky diaper underneath her short baby blue nightgown.

In comparison, the diaper she wore was undoubtedly MUCH bulkier than what 'Evie' was currently wearing, as the diaper was adorned in numerous magenta star outlines, along with being dyed a bright baby blue color. Suffice to say, Jane could feel how thick the infantile undergarment was, feeling how it was forcing her legs outwards in an almost waddling gait.

"*giggle* Well, looks like Mal isn't the only one in need of a change." 'Evie' chirped, placing her fingerless gloved hands on her hips in a content curve of her lips, just as Jane soon discovered how...warm the diaper was, which made her feel a bit more embarrassed whilst she thought, "Oh man. What did I get myself into?"

From there, Jane soon felt 'Evie' pull her up from the crib-like bed, gently guiding her towards what appeared to be an adult-sized changing table, all whilst feeling the noticeable bulky padding between her legs. Then, as if she was on autopilot, Jane propped herself up onto the table, where 'Evie' had unraveled the wet diaper from Jane's person, balling it up and throwing it into one of two disposal bins. One said "Evie", while the second bin said "Jane", each in babyish yet curvy writing.

"Feels good to get out of that wet thing, doesn't it, roomie?" 'Evie' chirped, as she then pulled out the same brand of diapers from what was once the underwear drawer, pulling out a pair from a diaper package, causing the crinkly undergarment to let out an audible *FWOOMPH!* in response, which showed it's almost cartoonishly large size.

And after being administered with some baby wipes and some baby powder, Jane soon felt 'Evie' casually tape the bulky diaper upon her lower regions, as it seemingly raised Jane's behind off the table face by a few inches.

Fortunately, 'Evie' was there to help Jane dismount from the changing table, where the blue-haired diapered beauty soon spoke to her roommate with a hint of concern as she kindly asked, "Jane, are you sure you're feeling alright? You seem a little...off today."

Needing to make up a reasonable excuse on the fly quick, Jane soon looked back at 'Evie' whilst the Fairy Goddaughter properly straightened out her nightgown and instinctively answered, "...I'm fine, Evie. I'm just...a little weird out is all."

"Oh? What do you mean?" 'Evie' curiously asked, willing to hear her friend out, as Jane knew that she needed some definitive answers to her current situation and soon elaborated, "...I just have a headache is all. Can you, um...remind me why we're in diapers anyway, Evie?"

"*giggle* Is that all? Oh, Eff-Gee, maybe you should lay a bit off of those midnight chocolate milk runs for now. You know how they can give you headaches." 'Evie' quipped, obviously finding this a little humorous, as if this was a regular occurrence. However, due to her loyalty to her friends, the diapered bluenette soon reassured Jane by putting her fingerless gloved hands in Jane's in easing her confusion, where 'Evie' then explained that the reason why they were in diapers was because...

From there, 'Evie' tilted her head in more confusion at Jane's revelation, akin to looking at a gift horse in the mouth. From there, she soon questioned, "..Do you need to see the nurse, Jane?"

"What? No! No, I'm fine. Sorry, I still must be half-asleep. Anyway, you were saying?" Jane deflected, attempting to not cause any further suspicion upon her in this strange yet familiar world she accidentally stumbled upon, as 'Evie' then continued, "...Well, alright. If you feel alright, I shouldn't pry."

"Anyway, the reason why these help us behave more like princesses is to aid in retaining our youthful innocence. Or at least, that's what your mother keeps telling us girls, anyway." 'Evie' elaborated, giving Jane some definitive details as to the rules of this world. From there, 'Evie' whispered into Jane's ear and hushed, "Though to be frank, Eff-Gee, I think your mother's doing this to us girls so she could feel like a parent again raising her little girl. Y'know?"

Of course, this didn't surprise Jane that much, know her own mother's personality traits and such, as thoughts weaved her opinions and mentally noted, "*sigh* Well, at least there are some things that'll never change, even if I'm now in some super-weird mirror world."

"Now... What do you say we get you out of those nighties and into something more fresh for the day, hmm?" 'Evie' chirped, going full-on fashion designer like the real Evie she knew, one would rather be wearing plaid than wear a diaper, as the diapered bluenette strode her way through the walk-in wardrobe closet, sifting through a few ensemble outfits, with an eager toothy grin on her luscious lips, as she loudly said, "Ah! These will do nicely!"

From there, 'Evie" calmly strolled out holding two distinct outfits in each hand. However, upon closer inspection, Jane could easily see how different "Evie's' attire was from the Evie she knew. The leather skirt was much shorter than expected, and it had a cut open area at the front, which nonchalantly flaunted off a blue fleece onesie diaper flap, thus making the noticeable diaper bulge around 'Evie's' privates all the more obvious.

Her black combat boots had also changed as well, to the point where Jane could no longer consider such shoes to be combat boots anymore, as they looked more puffy and childish in comparison, but with the same intricate details as always. In fact, even 'Evie's' cape-like shawl was different now, appearing as if it was made from fleece with a baby blue hue.

However, Jane soon snapped herself out of staring at her now semi-infantile clothed roommate for the time being,as 'Evie' soon presented her with two distinct outfits, as the bluenette then quipped, "...Well, since we're feeling a little adventurous today, I believe one of these scrumptious ensembles will do nicely. So, what do you think, Eff-Gee?"

In response, Jane respectively looked at each of the two outfits. One looked rather doll-looking, as usual of women's garments in Auradon, while the second outfit was more...rebellious than the other, looking something akin to an ensemble Mal, Evie, or any of the other VK girls would love wearing. Inevitably, after brief contemplation, Jane decided to go with...

"...I think I'll go with--" Jane responded, about to make her final verdict. That is, until the sound of their dorm-room door was slammed open with an audible *THUD!!* in response.

In turn, upon hearing the pristine door getting violently swung open, both Jane and 'Evie' quickly turned their heads simultaneously towards the source of the abrupt noise, only to see the all-too-familiar face of Mal, the daughter of Maleficent, one hand firmly planted against the door, huffing and puffing exuberantly, with what seemed like a few trickles of sweat down the smooth skin of her face.

However, much like 'Evie', Mal looked like she did when she first arrived in Auradon Prep, but with some obvious differences. First off, 'Mal's' asymmetric, multi-colored, leather jacket and ensemble had a more infantile appearance to them, as said leather jacket now appeared much softer in comparison to what Jane remembered, as the fabric was more akin to a fleece safety blanket, with the darker colors of green and purple taking on a lighter, more babyish hue.

Second (and the most obvious difference in Jane's opinion), was the ludicrously bulky bulge of a diaper jutting out indiscriminately underneath what appeared to be a baggy, infantile purple baby jumpsuit leggings, as the diaper's front and back padding made itself known by reaching a third of the way down 'Mal's' legs. Also, instead of her usual edgy leather heeled boots, 'Mal' now wore a set of baby footsies that were explicitly conjoined with the baggy leggings, as if this alternate version of Maleficent's daughter was wearing an adult-sized pair of footsie baby pajamas.

And yet, as 'Mal' huffed and stormed her way inside, Jane couldn't quite put her finger on it, but...Was it just her, or did 'Mal' look a bit more...Fuller than she remembered?

But as the purple-haired girl approached the two equally diapered girls, 'Evie' could somehow tell that something was amiss with her fellow VK, as she put on a half-hearted smile towards her B.F.F and asked, "What's up, M?" "E, we've got a problem. A big one!" 'Mal' flatly quipped, calling the bluenette by the first letter of her name, her voice sounding desperate and urgent.

"Whoa! Slow down, M. Take deep breaths." 'Evie' retorted, reminding 'Mal' to calm herself, as the purple-haired VK inhaled and exhaled several deep breaths, thus calming down...to an extent. From there, once 'Mal's' frustration had quelled somewhat, 'Evie' looked back at her, fingerless gloved hands placed on her diapered hips in a listening stance, then asked, "...Now then, care to tell me what's gotten you so worked up?"

But then, as if in a heartbeat, 'Mal's' whole demeanor went straight-on peeved to straight-up embarrassed, as if she was about to reveal quite a scandalous secret, fidgeting with her fingers a little, her cheeks turning a rosy red, and her emerald green eyes switching left to right in an almost rapid pace.

Inevitably, all of the nervousness reached a boiling point, which resulted in 'Mal' meekly answering, "...I-I've gotten fat." Clearly unable to actually understand what her friend just said, 'Evie' leaned herself closer to her friend and calmly asked, "...I'm sorry, M. What did you say?"

As if an insult to her own self-esteem, 'Mal' quickly unzipped her fleece off-colored jacket, pulling both sides of the garment to opposite sides, which revealed a rather startling discovery to 'Evie' and Jane, as 'Mal' then spoke with a defeated tone, head tilted down in a semblance of shame, and meekly uttered, "...I've gotten fat, E."

Both looking down towards what 'Mal' wanted them to focus on, Jane and 'Evie' quickly discovered what the purple-haired VK what was muttering about:

'Mal'...now bore a subtle but noticeable signs of a small developing potbelly.

Sure, it wasn't very noticeable, but it certainly was a cause of shame for 'Mal', just as Jane soon began to notice that 'Mal' seemed to be a little...bigger, in certain other places than her abdomen. Obviously, in response to her friend's newfound yet unwanted extra pounds, 'Evie' attempted to concoct a suitable reply given the current circumstances, where the diapered bluenette soon spoke to her fellow VK and retorted...

She began to calmly rub 'Mal's' back in a circular motion, which seemed to do the trick, as 'Mal's' consistent sobbing began to waver, becoming less in frequency, whilst she squeezed tightly in response. From there, 'Evie' then calmly spoke towards her slightly chubbier friend, seeing a tear or two stream down 'Mal's' seemingly fuller cheeks, as the diapered bluenette then asked, "...You wanna talk about it, M?"

The only response coming from the chubby diapered 'Mal' was a mere double nod to her friend, blinking thrice to get the waterworks out of her eyes, as Jane and 'Evie' carefully guided the clearly distressed 'Mal' over to a couch and adjacent coffee table. Hopefully, their sympathy and them supporting the stressed out VK would quell the tears.

== 34 Minutes Later... ==

For over the past half hour, 'Mal' reluctantly explained what she and Ben were planning in the near future, powering somewhat through the tears, whilst Jane and 'Evie' keenly listened to their weeping friend.

Apparently, Ben and Melody were good when they were little, and they still kept in contact with each other. However, when Ben was crowned and announced that he'll be letting a few of the kids from the Isle of the Lost into Auradon and Auradon Prep, Melody's parents, Queen Ariel and King Eric, had cancelled Melody's plans to attend Auradon Prep, obviously out of fear for their daughter's safety there, especially in the off-chance that Urusla's daughter was possibly among the transfer Villain Kids attending the prestigious academy.

Suffice to say, things didn't go as planned. And of course, the events that occurred with 'Mal' and the VKs transpired, Maleficent was defeated by her own daughter, yadda yadda. Things were looking up for 'Mal'.

...That is, until a few weeks ago. Apparently, word got out regarding Ben and 'Mal's' romance, and they had to make multiple visits to some of the other kingdoms to prove that this wasn't a ploy by 'Mal' to take over Auradon. Needless to say, it undoubtedly took it's toll on 'Mal's' now once lithe body.

Whilst 'Mal' had finished explaining, she began to elaborate that she recently picked up the bad habit of stress eating, and has been attempting to try every method to hide her newly acquired pudge from Ben, obviously out of worry on what Ben might think of her, whether it was resorting to wear constrictive corsets under her clothes, to sucking in her gut for extended periods of time and praying she doesn't split the seams of her clothes the moment she moves her body.

Currently, just as she had finished explaining her predicament to 'Evie' and Jane, 'Mal'...

"*sob* And that's why I'm so bugged out by all of this. *munch*" 'Mal' explained, who took a stressful munch out of a Baker's Dozen cream-filled cookie, her taste buds savoring every second of the creamy morsel, then swallowing the chewed edible debris down her throat and into her stomach.

Ever since she came to Auradon, they were her favorite brand of cookies outside of the Isle of the Lost. And that says something, considering where 'Mal' had lived previously alongside her fellow VKs.

But now...Now, Baker's Dozen came to as more akin to stress relief for the purple-haired VK, which didn't help in maintaining a thin waistline, so much so, that due to the recently consistent stress binges, 'Mal' had gone up a diaper size or two in the process. However, seeing how painful it was for her to witness her friend endure this downward spiral, 'Evie' figured now was a good time for an intervention, placing a gloved right hand upon 'Mal's' free left hand in comfort, where the bluenette softly spoke toward her now chubby best friend and stated, "...M...If you keep going at it like this, you're going to get fatter."

"*sob* I know, E. *munch* *munch* ...But I don't care about that right now. *munch*." 'Mal' retorted, feeling like throwing in the towel due to her encumbering stress. However, that tone soon changed when she felt 'Evie' swipe the plate of Baker's Dozen cookies from her possession, causing the distraught VK to impulsively whine, "...What are you doing, E?! I need those!"

"Uh uh, I think you've had enough, Mal." 'Evie' snapped, which made the distraught 'Mal' to shrink back some on the couch, with Jane watching the entire thing, knowing well not to gain Mal's ire, even if this was not the actual Mal sitting beside her.

Moments later after setting the plate of cookies off to the side, 'Evie' carefully sat beside her chubby purple-haired friend, akin to approaching a frightened animal, as she calmly placed a gentle fingerless gloved hand upon 'Mal's' hands, gripping them gently yet squeezing them tightly to show the sisterly bond between the two VKs. 'Evie' then spoke softly toward her distressed comrade and said, "...Mal, Ben wouldn't abandon you. You know that better than anyone!"

In response to her bluenette friend, 'Mal' exhaled a deep sigh in mild protest, then spoke toward 'Evie' and retorted, "E, look at me. I went up two diaper sizes in the span of a few weeks. I mean, I'm already in a Women's Large, for crying out loud!" 'Mal' briefly pulled down the hem of her baggy infantile leggings to show her bulkier diaper, which had a different design due to the extra pair of tapes on the diaper.

"...You might have gone up a few sizes, but..who knows? Maybe Ben likes girls with a little more meat on them." 'Evie' chirped, bearing a sisterly tone in her voice, as she place a calm hand upon the heavily padded front of 'Mal's' exposed diaper, causing it to crinkle loudly from such physical contact.

...And then the gears in 'Mal's' mind began to turn.

Did Ben...actually LIKE bigger girls? It's possible. He was an actual sweetheart, after all, as 'Mal' then promptly blushed some in a bashful demeanor towards 'Evie' and bashfully asked, "...Y-You really think so?"

With only a sisterly curve of her lips as her response, 'Evie' nodded in confirmation, as 'Mal' re-covered her diaper via letting go of the hem of her baggy leggings, where the bluenette then promptly pulled her friend up from the couch and chirped, "Absolutely, M! Now, why don't we get you out of your rut and go see what Ben thinks?"

However, as 'Evie' helped the chubbier 'Mal' back onto her footsie-covered feet, the bluenette quickly realized she unintentionally yet almost forgot about what she was doing prior to the transpired events, where 'Evie' then promptly picked up the hanging outfit ensembles by their coat hanger hooks, facing Jane and quipped, "*giggle* Anyway, before Mal had arrived...You were saying, Jane?"

"Oh, it's alright, Evie. I know better than to get between you and Mal." Jane retorted, accepting 'Evie's' polite yet subtle apology, as the Auradon native then briefly cleared her throat and continued, "Though, to be honest...I'm feeling a bit adventurous today, so...I'll take that outfit on your left."

And with that quote, Jane pointed towards the outfit in 'Evie's' left hand, which was obviously a VK-styled ensemble. In appearance, it was similar to 'Evie's' own outfit, but with some noticeable deviations. First off, it was in the same colors as Jane's usual ensemble when she first met Mal, with a light blue coloring to it.

And second, due to what sort of world she stumbled through, it had a somewhat infantile demeanor to it, complete with footsies attached to a pair of baggy baby green leggings, along with a cape-like shawl with long flowing sleeves that just reached her elbows, where a pair of magenta sleeves jutted out underneath the flowing shawl, along with a short but frilly skirt to complete the set.

Suffice to say, despite their different upbringings (And the fact that this wasn't HER Evie), Jane certainly admired 'Evie's' acquired tastes when it came to trendy fashions. However, in response to the AK's answer, both 'Mal' and 'Evie' were a little flabbergasted from Jane's bold answer at first, where the two VKs briefly looked at each other, then looking back at Jane as 'Evie' asked, "...Well, this is certainly unexpected. Seriously, what did you do with the real Jane?"

Amused at 'Evie's' sarcasm, Jane soon confessed, "Well...I was thinking of trying a few new things, Evie. And after Mal changed my hair, I figured "Hey, why not change myself a bit?" Y'know? Do something a little different from my usual routine."

At first, 'Evie' and 'Mal' honestly didn't know what to say for such a bold statement. But then, slowly but surely, a pair of mischievous grins appeared on their lips, as if they were excited about something, where they then looked back at the sitting Jane and 'Mal' cheekily quipped, "...You don't say?"

== 32 Minutes Later... ==

It took quite a while. But with some effort and creativity, 'Evie' and 'Mal' had finally donned a VK-styled ensemble upon the daughter of the Fairy Godmother. And without a shred of doubt, the two girls were proud of their work, as Jane now stood before a full-body mirror, trying to examine herself in the outfit, still getting used to the metaphorical edginess of the garments.

"So, uh...What do you think?" She asked, turning back around to face 'Mal' and 'Evie', who looked undoubtedly pleased with their handiwork, as 'Evie' became the first to reply, speaking toward the AK with cheerful enthusiasm and chirped, "...You look like a real VK now, Jane. Now then, what do you say we help Mal with her little problem?"

Obviously, Jane was in firm agreement with 'Evie's' idea, as 'Mal' certainly needed to hear what Ben had to say for herself. And with that, as they grabbed their purses on the way out, Jane, 'Evie', and 'Mal' proceeded to exit the dorm-room, and enter the hallways of Auradon Prep.

1253222112312211111121112121212131111211.content:
Looking around her current environment whilst keeping pace with 'Mal' and 'Evie', Jane quickly caught a glimpse of what made this mirror world vastly different from the one she knew.

Aside from the obviously diapered female classmates she and the two VKs passed by on the way to Ben's dorm, the first obviously notable difference that Jane discovered were the Girls' Restroom. It was only a brief glimpse, but it was enough for Jane to picture what made it so different:

Instead of seeing the usual restroom stalls and toilets, they were truly replaced by rows of changing tables, with a few of the girls laying on said tables getting their own diapers changed, as Jane even noticed how the universal symbol for the Girls' Room was noticeably different as well, with the human-shaped feminine silhouette now wore a diamond shape on the waist and hips, thus indicating that it was for diapered girls.

Surprisingly, none of the boys were affected in this mirrored world, remaining completely the same as Jane had remembered, so that made things far less foreign to her, taking several mental notes in the process whilst she contemplated, "...Well, there are certainly a few noticeable changes in this mirror world, that's for sure."

"...But still...I better keep a bit of a low profile, since I'm not sure how they'll react if they realize I'm actually not their version of Jane." Jane noted, doing her best to keep a brisk pace with the diapered 'Evie' and 'Mal', who don't seem to have difficulties in walking around in a pair of diapers, while Jane had to quickly readjust her stance whilst she walked due to her own diaper's thickness.

"Though...I better get used to walking around in these cumbersome things. I won't admit it outright, but..." Jane thought, her eyes oftentimes trailing off to view her new environs, as she subconsciously placed a sleeved hand upon the padded covered front of her diaper, which made it crinkle some on contact, where a brief upwards curve of her lips appeared on her face as she continued thinking, "...These diapers...They aren't all THAT bad. They're certainly comfy, that's for sure. *giggle*"

Briefly noting how some of the posters adorned on the walls appeared to be catered to the diapered girls in Auradon Prep, with absurdly silly quotes such as "Don't Be Blue With A Wet Diaper!" or "Always Check If Your Diaper's Dry!" strewn about a few of the posters in puffy infantile letter fonts. Suffice to say, it felt almost embarrassing for Jane to acknowledge that an alternate version of her mother was responsible for such drastic renovations to school conduct and dress code.

Looking on both sides of the hallway, Jane noted how each of the female students each sporting diapers in varying degrees of thickness. Some were wearing diapers decently thin enough that it could pass as regular panties, while other girls wore diapers that were so stupidly thick that it was borderline absurd, as well as appearing that they can only waddle instead of walking normally.

In fact, Jane could swear that she just saw Audrey wearing one of those ridiculously large bulky diapers when she, 'Evie', and 'Mal' passed by on their way to Ben's dorm.
1253222112312211111121112121212131111211.title: The Mirrored Auradon Prep

1253222112312211111121112121212131111211.content:
From there, with a simple gentlemanly gesture, 'Ben' allowed Jane, 'Evie', and 'Mal' to enter his personal dormitory, to which they respond in kind. Once they were inside, shortly after 'Ben' carefully closed the door behind him, he soon calmly approached the purple-haired VK and kindly asked, "So...What do I owe the--"

Before he could even finish,'Mal' (despite her chubby physique) swiftly hugged her "Prince Charming" with a pair of mildly plump arms, to which 'Ben' kindly returned the favor by wrapping his arms around her midriff, akin to gently stroking a pet cat, as Jane then calmly stated, "Ben...I believe Mal has something to say to you."

"...Is everything alright?" He questioned, a minute touch of concern in his voice, especially when it involves his girlfriend. From there, shortly after ending the loving embrace, 'Mal' hesitantly began to slowly unzip the front of her jacket, then slowly unfurled both sides of the jacket to ultimately reveal the source of her worries:

Her slightly profound bump of a belly.

"I...I-I've gotten fat, Bennyboo. I just...can't stand hiding this anymore." 'Mal' meekly answered, calling 'Ben' by such a pet nickname since they were in a romantic relationship, turning her head away from 'Ben' as if in shame. However, what would completely surprise was what her boyfriend said in response...

"...I know. You've stressed out as of late, haven't you, Mal?" He said, with a dash of loving affection and worry in his voice, as he cautiously approached her to comfort the purple-haired VK. Of course, upon hearing what he just said, 'Mal' quickly turned her gaze back on 'Ben' with a sliver of surprise on her slightly fuller face and meekly stammered, "...You...Y-You knew? B-But how?"

"Wow. Didn't see that coming." Jane noted, where she and 'Evie' watched as 'Ben' began to comfort 'Mal' by slowly wrapping his arms around her, causing his flat toned abdomen to unintentionally press itself against 'Mal's' cute yet plump little potbelly. From there, he laid one hand against her voluptuous mane of purple hair, gently stroking it in reassurance whilst he explained, "I've known for a little over a week now, Mal. Ever since you didn't come out of the bathroom straight away during our brief time in the Kingdom of Agrabah. You've been eating more to ease yourself for some time now."

"It's true, Ben. Before we came here, she was eating a bunch of Baker's Dozen cream cookies while she told Jane and I what's going on with her." 'Evie' elaborated, letting 'Mal's' boyfriend know just how much she's hurt, with Jane nodding in agreement with the diapered bluenette.

From there, 'Ben' looked back at the chubby diapered VK, who looked at him with a single tear streaming down her fuller left cheek. 'Ben' calmly wiped the tear from 'Mal's' cheek with his thumb whilst he retorted, "...I see."

From there, he stared right into 'Mal's' emerald green eyes with empathy and continued, "...Mal, I'm terribly sorry for having you endure this much distress. No matter what, I don't regret having you as my girlfriend." "But, Bennyboo...It's gotten out of hand. I-I mean, I...*sigh*" 'Mal' retorted, where she then placed her hand upon the waist of the baggy baby purple footsie leggings, and with a quick tug, she exposed her bulkier diaper to 'Ben' in emphasis, then continued, "...I've gone up two diaper sizes as a result of my stress eating. I feel like a failure in self-restraint."

"Mal...I really don't care what size you are. I still love you, no matter what." 'Ben' answered, as 'Mal' promptly let go of the waist of her baggy footsie leggings, where 'Ben' then quipped, "In fact..."

From there, much to the trio's shock, 'Ben' casually placed a gentle hand upon the outermost curve of 'Mal's' belly, as he then continued, "...I actually find you rather adorable like this, Mal."

"...Y-You do?" 'Mal' stammered, in complete surprise towards 'Ben's' confession, which also surprised both Jane and 'Evie' as well. However, in a rather bashful manner, 'Mal' then began to blush profusely, with an embarrassed upwards curve of her lips while her boyfriend then only gave the chubby diapered VK an affirmative nod in response.

Upon realizing how much of a fuss she seemingly made it, 'Mal' bashfully looked away from 'Ben' in embarrassment, looking down at her chubby potbelly, placing a fingerless gloved hand upon her cute little gut and bluntly stated, "*sigh*...I exaggerated, haven't I?"

"*chuckle* Yeah, pretty much." 'Ben' chortled, relieved to see 'Mal' being in a better mood, as the diapered VK then proceeded to re-zip her jacket, now feeling a little more confident with her pudge. Suffice to say, Jane was greatly relieved to see 'Mal' was now in a more positive mood.
1253222112312211111121112121212131111211.title: Mal's Confession

After keenly witnessing what has transpired before her, Jane figured that, for now, she wouldn't confess that she wasn't actually from this mirror world. ...Or at least, until she can properly obtain some concrete evidence to backup her claims, and hopefully find a way to get back to her own world.

"*giggle* Well...we'll certainly give it some thought, Ben. I always wanted to see the lands of Queen Ariel and King Eric." 'Evie' answered, obviously rather intrigued in paying a visit to Triton's Bay, known for it's stunning beaches, seaside villages, and coastal palaces.

However, 'Ben' soon became aware of Jane's current attire, where she then promptly asked, "Um, Jane? What's with the new style?" "Oh, this? I, uh...I-I'd thought I try something different. You know, getting out of my comfort zone and whatnot." Jane swiftly yet meekly stammered, to which 'Ben' soon came to understand what he saw before him, as he gave an understanding smile and nod then replied, "Oh. ...Well, it certainly explains your choice of clothes. Good to know you're trying something new, Jane."

== 3 Days Later... ==

Triton's Bay.

Known for many things, such as it's beautiful locales, pristine stunning beaches, seaside villages, and coastline palaces, it was also the home of Queen Ariel, King Eric, and their children, along with being neighbors with the undersea kingdom of Atlantica, home of numerous mermaids, as well as the dwellings of Queen Ariel's father, King Triton.

But for now... It was the vacation spot for King 'Ben', his girlfriend 'Mal', 'Evie', Jane, and a few others.

As they arrived via the royal limousine, the group were on approach toward the Main Palace, where Queen Ariel and her family primarily reside.

"*sigh* This place sure has changed since the last time I visited Melody." 'Ben' thought aloud, as he noted how the locals and seaside mermaids were working together in their daily toils, almost in a symbiotic relationship. Becoming rather curious with 'Ben's' ties to Queen Ariel's daughter, 'Mal' spoke toward her boyfriend in a curious tone and asked, "...So, how long have you known Melody?"

"...For most of my childhood, Mal. We first met when my parents and I were making visits to the other kingdoms, and my mother was rather close friends with Queen Ariel. They were near inseparable, almost like sisters, you could say." 'Ben' explained, which surprised 'Mal' some, considering how slightly different Queen Belle's personality was compared to what she's heard of Queen Ariel from all those stories her former friend, Uma, heard from her mother, Ursula, back on the Isle of the Lost.

And those might've possibly been rumors spread by Ursula out of spite.

But as she sat there in her rather bulky diaper underneath her usual VK ensemble, 'Mal' noted how 'Ben' had this look of nostalgia on his face, while she had an expression of reasonable concern on hers. 'Ben' soon took heed of 'Mal's' expression, tenderly rubbing her shoulder in comfort as he stated, "...Don't worry, Mal. Once they see how different you are from Maleficent and Ursula, they'll certainly welcome you with open arms."

"I know, Bennyboo. It's just...I was once friends with Ursula's own daughter back on the Isle of the Lost, and I'm not sure how Melody's mother will react if we tell her such a thing." 'Mal' hesitantly replied, pressing her chubby legs together in worry, causing the front of her adequately bulky diaper to crinkle loudly in response to such motion.
1253222112312211111121112121212131111211.title: Vacation In Triton's Bay

1253222112312211111121112121212131111211.content:
Although, despite 'Ben's' loving support and encouragement towards her, 'Mal' still exhibited a bit of a bad case of "Butterflies in her stomach", and as if on some semblance of nervousness, 'Mal' instinctively began to wet herself on the spot out of sheer nerves.

Fortunately, her baggy baby purple leggings remained as dry as ever, though her diaper took the full brunt of the onslaught of hesitant urine, causing her Women's Large diaper to expand and bloat outwards to a slightly noticeable degree, which was made all the more obvious by how the front of her baggy leggings looked snug and form-fitting.

Suffice to say, this wasn't exactly what 'Mal' would consider a "shining moment" in her time in Auradon.

"*snicker* Well, so much for our great and terrible leader." 'Jay', the athletic and attractive son of the villainous Jafar, snickered,obviously trying to stifle his laughter and crude amusement towards 'Mal's' rather embarrassing display, to which 'Lonnie', the daughter of Fa Mulan and Li Shang, soon rebutted such behavior from her escort by administering a quick but light jab against 'Jay's' ribcage, which promptly ceased his behavior for the time being, as he briefly rubbed his injured ribs to sooth it's bruised muscles.

"*sigh* Guess I better get you changed before we arrive at the Coastal Palace." 'Evie' stated, as she got 'Mal' to lay down on her back upon the limousine floor, proceeding to change 'Mal' into a fresh clean diaper.

However, upon looking back out the window overlooking the beautifully pristine shoreline, 'Ben's' mind began to wander a little, as he then let out a sigh, to which 'Carlos' asked, "...What's up with you?"

"Oh! Um...It's nothing, Carlos. It's just...*sigh*...I was wondering how Tobias is doing." 'Ben' answered, to which 'Lonnie' soon recognized as to who exactly her classmate was referring to, as she promptly retorted, "Ben...I didn't know you were actually friends with him. Wasn't his father related to Herkie's dad?"

"...Okay, this is completely new. I've never heard of Hercules having a sibling and a nephew before. This has gotta be one of the differences between this worlkd and my own world." Jane contemplated, noting that she'd never once hear any mention of the famed Hercules ever having other relatives outside of Zeus and the other Olympians, which meant this must've been only exclusive to this weird mirror world.

However, being a little curious herself, Jane continued listening to the conversation before her, as 'Ben' nodded in confirmation towards 'Lonnie' and elaborated, "...You're right on that regard. However, Tobias's father attempted to wage war on Olympus for some unknown reason long before Tobias was born. Thankfully, Tobias's dad stopped before there was too much damage, and went into a self-imposed exile."

However, just as 'Evie' had finished taping a new diaper on 'Mal', she looked back at 'Ben' and curiously asked, "Sounds...interesting. So, what does his father look like?"

"...Tobias didn't speak of him much, but from what I remembered, he said that his father was bald, had chalk white skin...Oh! And he also had this big swirling tattoo covering a part of his face, chest, and arm. ...Or at least, that's what he told me." 'Ben' explained, which certainly garnered Jane's interest a little as she mentally noted, "...Whoever this guy us, he sounds like some siirt of ferocious warrior."

125332111311.content:
A week later, Kitty returned to Doughnut Heaven. Ever since her first trip there, she had been stopping there at least twice during the day, on the way to and from Bayville High. Her orders were also becoming a bit bigger with each visit. First, she had done two gut punchers a day. Then, on Sunday, she had doubled it to four for her morning and afternoon trips, resulting in her eating 8 gut punchers each day in total. "Hi, Kitty! Back again I see." smiled the girl from the previous week. "Like, hey Becky. Can I have my usual?" Kitty smiled as she got ready for her morning doughnuts. Since she'd started coming daily, she had started becoming on first name basis with the majority of the workers. "Sure thing!" Becky chirped happily as she grabbed four gut punchers and placed them in a medium take-out box. "There you go! I also added three of the stuffers for you to try." Becky smiled to Kitty, accepting Kitty's money. "Thanks." Kitty giggled as she took the box and left happily. As she walked back to the X-Mansion, she pulled one of the stuffers out. Like the gut punchers, the stuffer was as big as her head. Kitty took a bite and moaned with pleasure. Her taste buds felt like they were gonna start singing and were all tingly, just like when she tried the gut punchers. She kept eating as she walked and, by the time she got to Bayville High, she had eaten all seven doughnuts and rubbing her even more bloated belly. "Like, I totally love Doughnut Heaven!" Kitty smiled as she burped even louder than the week before, giving her belly a gentle pat. It gurgled hopefully. "Like, sorry tummy. We gotta wait until after school." Kitty told it quietly.

Said usual included eight gut puncher doughnuts. "Hey Kitty... I know you only just doubling your orders, but would you like to expand it more?" she asked, putting four gut punchers in a box and another four in a second. Kitty thought it over. "Like, what else've you got?" Kitty questioned. "Well, the Chocolate Belly bomb is pretty good and so is the Extra-Large Long Johns." Becky offered. Kitty eyed said doughnuts. The Chocolate Belly bomb was as large as the gut punchers, with chocolate frosting and red sprinkles. And the Extra Large Long Johns were like normal Long Johns, but much lumpier and fatter. "Like, I'll try six of the Chocolate Belly Bombs and 8 of the Extra Large Long Johns." Kitty smiled, pulling a twenty out.

"Like, I have the entire mansion to myself!" Kitty squealed as she happily went to her and Rogue's room. She closed the door and sat on her bed with her doughnut boxes. She opened the top one and lifted an Extra Large Long John out.

The moment it touched her tongue, Kitty shoved it entirely into her mouth. With two enormous chews, it went down her gullet with a loud gulp. "Like, soooo yummmmyyyy!" Kitty moaned as she grabbed and stuffed two into her mouth this time.

Soon, all the ELLJs were in her belly as Kitty moved on to the Chocolate Belly bombs. Then, she wolfed down her normal afternoon doughnuts. She didn't stop to take a breath until she'd licked the last crumb and frosting from the boxes.

Then, she laid on her back and let out a ginormous burp while drumming on her bloated belly. "Like, these are totally the yummiest doughnuts I've ever eaten!" Kitty giggled in delight, burping loudly again after gently pressing down on her gut.

Kitty laid there for awhile, burping and occasionally farting and then fell asleep holding her jumbo tummy, dreaming about doughnuts.

Five hours later, Kitty leaned back in her chair. *BBBBUURRRRRPPPP!!!* She belched loudly, her belly even more bloated than it was a few hours ago. "Like, I'm so stuffed." She panted. "I'll say. You ate most of the gut punchers and stuffers and half of both the Chocolate Belly Bomb and Extra Large Long johns!" Becky remarked with a sympathetic smile. Kitty's cream t-shirt and pink sweater were both covered in powder sugar and cream filling, her face had frosting and sprinkles plastered on it and her belly hung over her pants' waistband. "Like, thanks again Becky. It was totally awesome. Especially those last 16 gut punchers." Kitty smiled as she started to leave, grabbing her backpack and waddling slightly towards the exit, wiping her sweater and t-shirt off, as well as her face with napkins. "See you tomorrow?" Becky guessed with a grin. "You, like, totally know it!" Kitty cheered, now completely cleaned up, as she left. On the way home, Kitty worried slightly. Even though Professor X, Beast and Storm were all gone for the month, she knew she'd need to think of something to tell Scott, Jean, Kurt, Rogue and Evan for why she wasn't in school. Quickly, she managed to button up her sweater, hiding her bigger belly as she reached the Institute. "Like, here goes nothing." She said quietly, stifling a big burp as she reached the doors. Inside the living room was Scott, Jean, Kurt and Rogue. Evan had already gone to hang out with his skateboard pals. "Kitty! Where've you been?" Jean asked with concern. "Yeah. We got worried when we learned you didn't come to school after stopping at that doughnut place." Scott agreed with a relieved smile. "Where were you, Kitty?" Kurt asked. "Oh. Um... like, nowhere special." Kitty said quickly. At that moment, her large belly gave a low, yet audible rumble. "Uh oh." Kitty whimpered in alarm.

Rogue came in to find Kitty struggling to zip up her uniform. As she watched, Rogue noticed Kitty's new weight. For the last month, Rogue and the others hadn't said anything as Kitty grew rounder, thinking she would notice. However, though she was struggling, Kitty still didn't seem to notice her roundness. "Hey Kit. Ya need help?" Rogue asked, tugging her gloves on. "Hey, Rogue. Like, no thanks. I've totally got it under control." Kitty huffed, her belly jiggling as she bounced up and down, trying to get that dang zipper to work. Rogue watched for a second before taking a deep breath. "Okay, look Kitty... The others and Ah have kept this quiet fer a month 'cause we thought ya'd notice on your own, but... haven't ya noticed you've put on a few?" She asked gently. Kitty finally zipped her uniform and turned to look at her best friend, teammate and roommate. "Like, what are you talking about, Rogue?" she asked, wiping the sweat off her forehead. "Kitty, really look at yourself." Rogue said. Kitty slowly looked at her rounder body. Her belly bulged over her belt, her face was rounder, her arms and legs were also meatier and her butt had rounded out as well. "Ever since you've started eatin' at Doughnut Heaven, you've been packin' on weight like heck!" Rogue said gently. Kitty just poked her belly with a finger and watched it sink into her flab.

What happens next?

Kitty's uniform rips

or

Kitty goes on the mission with the others

Take your pick!

1253321113321.content:
Kitty was walking towards the Xavier institute after a day of shopping at the Bayville Mall. As she walked, she noticed an old fashioned bake shop. Curious, Kitty decided to check it out.

As she entered, Kitty saw it was also old fashioned on the inside. It had old chairs and tables that, despite their age, were still in very good shape. Though, there weren't many people, despite it being mid-afternoon. Despite this, there was a fairly long line.

Kitty got in line and looked at the glass case. There were cupcakes and slices of normal cakes for fairly decent prices. After a few minutes, Kitty's turn came. A plump redhaired girl around Kitty's age was working the counter.

"Hi and welcome to Schulz Bakery, where we've been pleasing costumers for 100 years. My name's Brittney. What can I get you?" asked the girl in a cheerful voice. Kitty looked at the options again before she decided.

"Like, I'll take one of the Choco Creamed cupcakes." Kitty smiled. Brittney nodded and pulled one of said cupcakes out. It was a large chocolate cupcake with chocolate creamed frosting inside, white frosting and colored sprinkles on it.

"That'll be 3 dollars, please," Brittney smiled. Kitty handed over the money, telling Brittney to keep the change. As she left, Kitty unwrapped the cupcake and took a bite. Upon contact, her taste buds erupted in singing. It was basically the best thing she'd ever eaten. She quickly wolfed it down and licked her fingers to make sure she didn't waste a crumb or smear of frosting/filling.

"Like, that was totally the best cupcake I've ever eaten! I totally gotta hit that place again!" Kitty smiled letting out a gentle burp as she gave her fingers one last lick to make sure she got all the crumbs, frosting and filling.

What next?

One afternoon, Frankie Wong and Paige Olvera were getting ready to shoot a new online video for Bizzardvark. "What'd you have in mind, Paige?" asked Frankie as they set up the camera. "Well, I was thinking we do a diaper themed rap." Paige smiled. "Really?" Frankie said in surprise. "Yeah... You know, since we both love wearing and using them." Paige explained. "I love it." Frankie smiled happily. Soon, the duo had stripped off their pants and underwear, replacing them with thick diapers. "So the rap's gonna be called 'Poopin' and Peein' in Diapers'." Paige explained to Frankie. "Not a bad title. So who's gonna go #1 and #2?" Frankie remarked as she adjusted the waistband of her diaper.

Frankie smiled back. With that, the video began with hip hop music playing as the duo began dancing in place. "Yo, yo, yo! This is Paige and Frankie and we here to show youse how to go pee and poop in yo' diapers!" Paige said in her best gangster voice. "Yeah. We just love to feel that stuff on our butts. Diapers are cool (poop poop poop). They're comfy and durable. (wee, wee, wee). So just go and take a big ol' dump or pee in your comfy diapers!" 1522311211.content:
Even though she had been toilet trained since she was 3, Violet had secretly enjoyed diapers over a potty and would wear them under her clothes. Whenever she needed to go to the bathroom, she would take her diaper off and use the toilet, then put the diaper on again. Even when she went to the factory, she secretly wore a diaper under her jumpsuit. Luckily, the diaper had stretched out with her jumpsuit when she swelled into a blueberry. Now, she was being rolled to the juicing room to be juiced. She just hoped that her father wouldn't discover her diaper if she had to be stripped of her clothes.

UPDATE FOR EVERYONE ADDING OR JUST VIEWING
WEIGHT GAIN MUST BE REALEST SO NO SUPER POWER INVOLVING WG OR SO AND SO GAINED 5000 POUNDS OVER NIGHT. Hope this might satisfy people adding or viewing enjoy. - your friendly neighborhood Alien.

Anime
Cartoons
Movies/comic books
Internet shorts or things like RWBY
Live action TV shows that can go from full house to game of thrones
Sex of all genders
Things that arent allowed
No feithes that arent invloed with diapers/ABDL or weight (vores not allowed)
No killing
Besides that have fun.
